participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Cautious and introspective, Jordan tends to think deeply about his experiences and how they shape him.
participant_1.background: I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity. I've had to protect myself from bullies, but I'm not a fighter by nature. I enjoy driving my Ford truck to work as a security guard. I like to train dogs. My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and creative, Emily enjoys exploring new places and expressing herself through storytelling.
participant_2.background: I live in a small town in the Midwest, USA. I wear comfortable clothes that are easy to move around in. I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet. My dad was a cop until he was killed. My daily routine consists of applying for jobs and working on my own stories in the hopes that one day I'll be published.

content.text: Good morning!  Where are you from?
I live in a small town in the Midwest.  Where are you from?
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I moved to a big city when I was in college.
I've always wanted to live in a big city, but I'm afraid I'd miss my family and friends.
I miss my family and friends sometimes, but I love the city life.  There's always something to do and see.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, go to museums, and go out to eat.
I like to go to the movies and go out to eat too.
We should go out to eat sometime!
Great! I'll text you my number.
